p: Pharmacological appraisals of medicinal herbs are connected to the bioactive metabolites present [ 2]. Pharmacological assessments of different parts of S. media authenticated its anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, antimicrobial, anti-obesity, antidiabetic, anxiolytic and antileishmanial activities ( Table 2). The pronounced pharmacological activities of S. media could be linked to the ethnopharmacological beliefs [ 42].
